definitions.definition: A short - horned goat antelope native to mountainous terrain in southern Europe ; Rupicapra rupicapra .
Ellipsis of chamois leather ( “ soft pliable leather originally made from the skin of chamois (nowadays the hides of deer, sheep, and other species of goat are alternatively used) ” ) .
The traditional colour of chamois leather.
An absorbent cloth used for cleaning and polishing, formerly made of chamois leather.
A padded insert which protects the groin from the bicycle saddle .

main_definition: A short - horned goat antelope native to mountainous terrain in southern Europe ; Rupicapra rupicapra .
secondary_definitions: Ellipsis of chamois leather ( “ soft pliable leather originally made from the skin of chamois (nowadays the hides of deer, sheep, and other species of goat are alternatively used) ” ) .
The traditional colour of chamois leather.
An absorbent cloth used for cleaning and polishing, formerly made of chamois leather.
( cycling ) A padded insert which protects the groin from the bicycle saddle .
